Activities commonly implemented under this intervention

Provide financing options for research and education in livestock development issues.

Guidance for increased environmental sustainability

P7. Include calls for science and policy research proposals on, for example, silvopastoral system development, integrated land management, sustainable pasture management, carbon stocks in silvopastoral livestock systems, and monitoring reporting and verification approaches for GHG emission reduction.
P7. In local universities and professional schools, develop educational programs on sustainable grazing systems.
